Package ml.alternet.parser.visit

Base algorithms for visiting rules.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TraversableRule
    This interface is used by Rules in order to traverse them.
    TraversableRule.CombinedRule
    Allow to traverse a combined rule, that is to say a rule made of several rules.
    TraversableRule.SimpleRule
    Allow to traverse the nested rule embedded in this rule.
    TraversableRule.StandaloneRule
    A standalone rule doesn't embed nested rules.
    Visitor
    The rules visitor.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Dump
    Dump a rule.
    LogVisitor
    Log visited rules.
    Transform
    Traverse composed rules and apply a transformation on nested rules.
    TransformTrackingHost
    Traverse composed rules and apply a transformation on nested rules ; track the closest enclosed host rule while traversing.
    Traverse
    Traverse composed rules.

Package ml.alternet.parser.visit Description

Base algorithms for visiting rules.
